title: Karnataka withdraws pre-show cause IGST notice to Infosys
description: The IT services giant received the notices on July 31, pertaining to services it received from its overseas branches in various foreign countries. The Salil Parekh-led company has maintained that it is fully compliant with state and central legislations in this matter.
content: The Karnataka government has withdrawn the Rs 32,000 crore tax notice to Infosys, but the story that has sparked a hue and cry is far from over.
cleaned_content: the karnataka government has withdrawn the rs <THREE_TEN_THOUSAND> crore tax notice to infosys but the story that has sparked a hue and cry is far from over
